content: ptiloris hat by anya hawkins all photographs except the one on the title page are unprintable in order to save ink the title page is not essential and may be left out when printing © anya hawkins 2025 for pattern support contact knitsbyhawkins@gmail com this pattern is for personal use do not sell this pattern or items made from it ptiloris hat is a simple unisex beanie made with sport weight yarn in two colors the colorwork pattern is inspired by plumage on a breast of the paradise riflebird ptiloris paradiseus with its subtle transition from black to gray but there s no need to keep to only these colors any two colors can be used depending on your preference this hat is a perfect project for a first venture in colorwork knitting pattern contains both chart and written instructions for colorwork part of the hat for every step there are helpful video tutorials there is also a tutorial for a fleece lining for a hat if you have sensitive skin on your forehead or just don t want to have an imprint of a ribbing after wearing a hat or if your winter is too cold and windy for a hat made with relatively thin yarn give it a try the link for a complete video tutorial for lining is provided sample on photo is in size m on a model with a 21 8 54 5 cm head in circumference ptiloris hat by anya hawkins sizes difficulty level s 20 51 cm head circumference beginner intermediate experienced m 21 53 cm l 22 56 cm techniques used xl 23 58 cm knit finished measurements s 9 5 23 5 cm wide and 10 5 26 cm tall lying flat m 10 24 5 cm wide and 10 5 26 5 cm tall lying flat l 10 5 26 cm wide and 11 28 cm tall lying flat xl 11 28 cm wide and 11 5 29 5 cm tall lying flat a 9 5 10 10 5 11 23 5 24 5 26 28 cm b 10 5 10 5 11 11 5 26 26 5 28 29 5 cm c 1 4 1 4 1 6 1 6 3 5 3 5 4 4 cm d 2 2 2 4 2 4 2 6 5 5 6 6 6 5 cm notions stitch marker tapestry needle to weave in the ends optional -
